Class MonthlyStatement

java.lang.Object
MonthlyStatement
public class MonthlyStatement extends Object
Represents a monthly statement for a customer's account.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MonthlyStatement(Map<String,Transaction> transactionMap)
    Constructs a monthly statement object.
